name: Hell3Sixty
description:

Authors:

Iacopo Regoli | Game design, game programming

Andrea Ettorina Tremari | Graphic design, game design

Sounds (Temporarily) from freesound.org

Sadly no music for now

Once upon a time there was an angel, Mike, who dreamed of becoming an archangel, but to rise through the ranks he had to work his way up. So he was tasked by his superiors to clean out the hell loop rooms and prepare them for the next damned to be tortured in an endless loop of 60 seconds until he pays for his sins. BUT something went wrong! He pressed the wrong button and started the loop. Demons began to appear... Can Mike survive the Hell Loop?

Commands: 

Move: WASD

Shoot: left click

Charge bat: hold right click and spin

Swing bat: release right click

P: pause

Hint: The more you spin the bigger the bat, the more enemies it can hit, the further they fly.

Squash enemies to the wall or shoot them to kill them.

Perform tricks with the spinning club, every 3 tricks upgrades the ranged weapon.
